constraints.description: We have to use 'CreateProject' as the first tool and can not use it subsequently
If the tool 'CreateDefect' is used, we eventuallz have to use 'RelaxStructure' afterwards
If we use the tool 'CreateAntisite', we have to use 'CalcChemicalPotentialB'
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1Vac', we can not use the tool 'CreateAntisite' previously
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1Vac', we can not use the tool 'CreateVacancy' more than once
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1AS', we can not use the tool 'CreateVacancy' previously
If we use the tool 'CalculateAntisiteEnergy', we can not use the tool 'CreateAntisite' more than once
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy2Vac', we can not use the tool 'CreateAntisite' previously
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy2Vac', we have to use 'CreateVacancy' at least twice and there can be a step in between
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy2Vac', we can not use 'CreateVacancy' more than two times
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy2Vac', we can only use 'CreateVacancyAl' or 'CreateVacancyFe', not both
constraints.formula: (! F <'CalculateEnergy2Vac'(;)> true) | (G ((! <'CreateVacancyAl'(;)> F <'CreateVacancyFe'(;)> true) & (! <'CreateVacancyFe'(;)> F <'CreateVacancyAl'(;)> true)))

constraints.description: If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy2AS', we can not use the tool 'CreateVacancy' previously
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy2AS', we have to use 'CreateAntisite' at least twice and there can be a step in between
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy2AS', we can not use 'CreateAntisite' more than two times
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy2AS', we can only use 'CreateAntisiteAl' or 'CreateAntisiteFe', not both
constraints.formula: (! F <'CalculateEnergy2AS'(;)> true) | (G ((! <'CreateAntisiteAl'(;)> F <'CreateAntisiteFe'(;)> true) & (! <'CreateAntisiteFe'(;)> F <'CreateAntisiteAl'(;)> true)))

constraints.description: If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1VacAB', we can not use the tool 'CreateAntisite' previously
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1VacAB', we have to use 'CreateVacancy' at least twice and there can be a step in between
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1VacAB', we can not use 'CreateVacancy' more than two times
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1VacAB', we have to use 'CreateVacancyAl' and 'CreateVacancyFe'
constraints.formula: (! F <'CalculateEnergy1VacAB'(;)> true) | (G ((! <'CreateVacancyAl'(;)> F <'CreateVacancyAl'(;)> true) & (! <'CreateVacancyFe'(;)> F <'CreateVacancyFe'(;)> true)))

constraints.description: If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1ASAB', we can not use the tool 'CreateVacancy' previously
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1ASAB', we have to use 'CreateAntisite' at least twice and there can be a step in between
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1ASAB', we can not use 'CreateAntisite' more than two times
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1ASAB', we have to use 'CreateAntisiteAl' and 'CreateAntisiteFe'
constraints.formula: (! F <'CalculateEnergy1ASAB'(;)> true) | (G ((! <'CreateAntisiteAl'(;)> F <'CreateAntisiteAl'(;)> true) & (! <'CreateAntisiteFe'(;)> F <'CreateAntisiteFe'(;)> true)))

constraints.description: If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1ASA1VacA', we have to use 'CreateDefect' at least twice and there can be a step in between
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1ASA1VacA', we can not use 'CreateDefect' more than two times
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1ASA1VacA', we have to use 'CreateVacancy' and 'CreateAntisite'
constraints.formula: (! F <'CalculateEnergy1ASA1VacA'(;)> true) | (G ((! <'CreateAntisite'(;)> F <'CreateAntisite'(;)> true) & (! <'CreateVacancy'(;)> F <'CreateVacancy'(;)> true)))

constraints.description: If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1ASA1VacA', we can not use a combination of 'CreateDefectAl' and 'CreateDefectFe'
constraints.formula: (! F <'CalculateEnergy1ASA1VacA'(;)> true) | (G ((! <'CreateAntisiteAl'(;)> F <'CreateVacancyFe'(;)> true) & (! <'CreateAntisiteFe'(;)> F <'CreateVacancyAl'(;)> true) & (! <'CreateVacancyAl'(;)> F <'CreateAntisiteFe'(;)> true) & (! <'CreateVacancyFe'(;)> F <'CreateAntisiteAl'(;)> true)))

constraints.description: If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1ASA1VacB', we have to use 'CreateDefect' at least twice and there can be a step in between
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1ASA1VacB', we can not use 'CreateDefect' more than two times
If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1ASA1VacB', we have to use 'CreateVacancy' and 'CreateAntisite'
constraints.formula: (! F <'CalculateEnergy1ASA1VacB'(;)> true) | (G ((! <'CreateAntisite'(;)> F <'CreateAntisite'(;)> true) & (! <'CreateVacancy'(;)> F <'CreateVacancy'(;)> true)))

constraints.description: If we use the tool 'CalculateEnergy1ASA1VacB', we can not use a combination of 'CreateDefectAl' and 'CreateDefectFe'
constraints.formula: (! F <'CalculateEnergy1ASA1VacB'(;)> true) | (G ((! <'CreateAntisiteAl'(;)> F <'CreateVacancyAl'(;)> true) & (! <'CreateAntisiteFe'(;)> F <'CreateVacancyFe'(;)> true) & (! <'CreateVacancyAl'(;)> F <'CreateAntisiteAl'(;)> true) & (! <'CreateVacancyFe'(;)> F <'CreateAntisiteFe'(;)> true)))
